name: Cavegirl Adventures
description:
Cavegirl adventures is one of the few platform games that are not only interesting, but also have rich functionality and original graphics. This game was created based on the animated film The Flintstones. This adventure game is perfect for both a single player and as a game for the whole family. The plot of the game develops in the Stone Age, at a time when people were surrounded by many dangers, they are also present in this game. The main task of the player is to feed his tribe. In order to do this, the cave girl must overcome many obstacles.

Jumping over predatory flowers. Overcoming artificial obstacles, such as pits with stakes, moving on platforms and ledges that are in the air. Overcoming water obstacles and so on.

A cave girl conducts a real research and overcomes many obstacles, all in order to tear off giant eggs and feed her family. This game is imbued with the spirit of adventure and really captivates, both adults and children. It is worth noting the unique graphics of the game, everything is done in matte soft colors, the nature of the Stone Age is shown, in which there is a lot of greenery.

The developer of this platformer game is DotGames, it should be noted that the game was really a success. It is important that you do not have to spend a lot of time on completing each level, that is, in order to win, you need to spend only a few minutes. That is why the game will really appeal to children, because they do not like long and difficult levels, and everything is simple and, importantly, interesting.

If you want to conduct an interesting exploration of the world of the Stone Age, test yourself, find really cool adventures, then the platform game Cavegirl Adventures or Flintstones will be an excellent choice. Note that in this game everything is thought out to the smallest detail, it is not only original and fascinating graphics, but also a non-trivial plot, if adults like the toy, then children will definitely like it.

Why do we recommend this game? Yes, we play it ourselves and we can say that after completing the game and passing all the levels, you just can't help but heartily recommend it to absolutely everyone. This is really a world full of adventures, exploring the dangerous but fascinating world of the Stone Age. If you don't want to spoil your surprise.
